name: Undead Survivor (Amauri)
description:
Can you dodge the enemies, collect coins and kill them all before the next wave comes? How to Play:

Stand still to shoot, collect coins and upgrade to survive 10 waves of enemies.

Keys W, A, S, D for movement and ESQ to pause. very simple!

Undead Survived was a project I created to study about game programming with unity, for someone to become a professional in this area =)

I used ready-made Assets, and as a reference two games I recently played. One that's on that platform, 10 minutes till dawn, and a mobile game called Hunt Royale.

More details about the game, and all the code can be accessed on GitHub.

Links

Code and more: GitHub

Follow-me:  @lutrigames

I hope you like the game, I left suggestions for improvements and bugs found in the comments (of course there are)
